author: Brian F
text: 'Solid spot - great atmosphere- burger was legit delicious'

author: Natalie Charle Ellis
text: 'We had a beautiful date night! The wine was delicious and the artichoke appetizer as well as the pasta. I will say we got the short rib and wasn‚Äôt my favorite and a pretty fatty cut of meat. So next time I will stick to their pasta because you can tell it is handmade with delicious sauces and the scallops were cooked perfectly. We will be back!'

author: Florent Verbeke
text: 'Awesome food
column5: even better drinks
column6: fantastic atmosphere.'

author: Jason Lopez
text: 'Grand Vin is a family. And when you are a part of that family
column5: you can never go wrong.'

author: Julian Lipinski
text: 'Fantastic venue
column5: ambiance and food. Very memorable experience. Best sea bass I can recall
column6: short rib was slow cooked and delicious. Would love to return for another meal.'

author: E M
text: 'This is my favorite restaurant in Hoboken! The food and cocktails are consistently good and the vibe is always warm and welcoming!'

author: johncz100
text: 'Favorite bar/restaurant in Hoboken. Delicious food
column5: great service
column6: and wonderful ambience.  Great spot to grab a drink or sit down for a meal'

author: Janelle Hoffman
text: 'Grand Vin hosted us for our engagement party
column5: and it was honestly one of the best days of our lives! I highly
column6: highly recommend them if you are looking to host a shower or any kind of celebration!\n\nTo start
column7: this restaurant is our happy place. We come here about once a week ether to have dinner or enjoy a drink at the bar. So
column8: when we were considering having an engagement party
column9: we knew it would have to be at Grand Vin.\n\nDecor reminds me of Napa
column10: like a slightly rustic (but also super classy) wine bar. You don‚Äôt even need much decor because the string lights and greenery throughout the restaurant set the perfect
column12: Amanda and Mike (the managers) were communicative and so helpful organizing everything. I was able to drop off decor the day prior and then leave everything fully in their hands to execute. We spent about the first 45 mins or so of the party hanging out in the bar area with passed appetizers
column13:
then were all seated in the dining room for the meal. They timed all of the courses perfectly and the portions were incredibly generous!

The food is insanely good; everyone kept talking about it. I dream of that sea bass and gnocchi all the time!

We had about 45 people seated in their back dining area
column14: but they can fit a bit more than that if you rent out the whole space. There is also a parking garage about a block away (a SUPER huge plus for all Hoboken venues!).'

author: Tatiana Super
text: 'Delicious food with generous portions. Excellent service.'

author: ScodaWithLime
text: "The atmosphere is lovely. We sat outside and the seating with string lights and dividers from the street made for a nice atmosphere. We had a table of 7 (for a birthday dinner) and ordered a few different apps for split. Stuffed shrimp
column5: buratta
column6: calamari and tacos all delicious. I had the chicken dish which was huge and just so amazing. My boyfriend had the pork chop and said not one part was dried out. A few others had the gnocchi and it was also delicious. Everyone loved their food and the prices aren't terrible considering the quality you get. I would definitely recommend and I plan to return."

author: Kristina Matyushchenko
text: 'Food is ok but VERY SLOW service. You literally have to wait for your order an hour and a half and remind the servers 50 times to bring stuff you asked for... I don‚Äôt think we are eating here again.'

author: Elizabeth Wasserman
text: "Food here is really good. Service was not great when I went. Our server sat down with a customer at a table for some time while we were eating. I'm not usually annoying about service because I understand but sitting at the table across from us with a customer while we don't have water is not a great look. Additionally
column5: we ordered a dish that said it came with shrimp on the menu but it arrived with scallops which I don't love and don't usually order. I didn't want to send it back so I just alerted the server their menu was incorrect and he didn't believe me until I pulled up the QR code menu and showed him. He comped the dish-thank you.\n\nThe main entree I got was chillean sea bass with spinach
column6: it was delish. Also the mussels marinara were really good! I do recommend I think it was just an off day. Will return."

author: reshma srinivas
text: 'Wonderful decor and vibe with live music! Food was absolutely delicious as well.'

author: Nathaniel Brown
text: 'Bloody Mary was wonderful
column5: garnished with blacked shrimp. I ordered the shrimp tacos hoping for the same blackened shrimp but more generic
column6: smaller shrimp which was disappointing. The food still tasted great however.'

author: Swapnil Srivastava
text: 'The place is trendy or cute or whatever
column5: but the food is just average.'

author: Jazleen Gongora
text: 'Came here for my boyfriend‚Äôs 21st birthday. I love love loved the food. It was incredible and I‚Äôm a really picky person when it comes to Italian food. I ordered the rigatoni vodka and he ordered the four cheese ravioli. The only reason I‚Äôm not making it 5 stars is because I told 2 waiters to bring a dessert with a candle on it for my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday and they didn‚Äôt. Overall
column5: I loved the food and ambiance.'

text: 'Nice place

author: Angela Cruz
text: "Absolutely beautiful decor... cozy
column5: romantic. Perfect for a cute date
column6: but also for a nice evening with close friends and/or relatives. Delicious entrees and appetizers. A good variety of cocktails and wines. They have very good wine bottles as well if you're willing to spend the money. I highly recommend this spot."

text:
'Don‚Äôt go if you have a stroller. This place is not for you mom !!

Rude staff!!!'

text: 'Great restaurant for outdoor brunch! The overall atmosphere and decor of the restaurant is pretty

author: Andrew G
text: "The food was excellent: the grilled salmon and the angel hair pasta we had were spot on. The beer selection isn't bad . One star off for the disorganized and indifferent service
column5: including the awkward menu setup (iPad for drinks
column6: a website for the rest...). The place is also darker than it needs to be."

author: Jess Pascale
text: 'Went for Sunday brunch with a friend. We both got the seasonal Apple Spiced Mimosas. I had the Avocado Toast Benedict with truffle fries & she had the Truffle Omelette. We both loved our meals and our drinks
column5: raved about the deliciousness of both throughout our experience. Excellent quality of food and service for a very reasonable price. Super cute atmosphere outdoor dining & the interior is cozy and charming as well. I would definitely recommend Grand Vin for brunch. I‚Äôm interested in returning to try their Everything Bloody Mary and their dinner menu!'

text: 'Tried to have a drink and a few apps at 6pm tonight
column5: but was told we needed a reservation.    What???    ..... there were at least 12 or more tables outside empty!   I guess they did not want the business.  I find it hard to believe they had 12 tables reserved.  So
column6: we went to Il Tavolo di Palmisano and had a great meal and drinks.  I will not try again. Grand Sin.'

author: Bobby Farrell
text: "Went there to get drinks on the go. Their cocktails do not have prices on them.  The one we got ended up costing $20. Complete scam. Worth more like $5. Plus they made the tip included but didn't tell us. Just gave us a receipt with a tip line so I double tipped them and they said nothing.  Was trying to support local businesses but wasn't expecting to get scammed. Never going there again.  Now I hope they go out of buisness.  Not how you treat your customers."

text: 'We had a great experience at Grand Vin! Everyone‚Äôs food and drinks were delicious and our waitress Bianca was very accommodating. We especially loved the pappardelle pasta with vodka sauce with scallops. We will certainly be returning. Thanks for a great evening!'
